hero.memberGreeting: Welcome to the Rheumatology Association of Uzbekistan

mission.title: Main Goal
mission.subtitle: of the Rheumatology Association of Uzbekistan
mission.text: To promote the development of medical science and practice in order to preserve and strengthen public health, to create a system of qualified rheumatological care for the population of our country that meets world standards, to train specialists in this field in the republic, to improve their qualifications, and to contribute to the implementation of scientific and practical research.

history.title: About the Association
history.text1: The Rheumatology Association of Uzbekistan is a professional community uniting physicians across the country to combat rheumatic diseases.
history.text2: The organization focuses on disease prevention, promoting healthy lifestyles, protecting the interests of medical professionals, and strengthening international ties in healthcare.
history.text3: As part of developing international cooperation, the association actively collaborates with leading global organizations in rheumatology — EULAR, APLAR, and the Association of Rheumatologists of Russia.

member1.name: Mirakhmedova Khilola Tukhtasinovna
member1.position: Chairman of the Association. Chief Consultant in Rheumatology of the Ministry of Health of Uzbekistan. Head of the Department of Propaedeutics of Internal Diseases No.1, TashSMI

member2.name: Nabieva Dildorakhon Abdumalikovna
member2.position: Head of the Department of Faculty and Hospital Therapy, Occupational Pathology No.1, TashSMI

partners.subtitle: The association actively cooperates with leading international organizations in rheumatology

charter.title: Association Charter
charter.description: The charter defines the goals, objectives and principles of the Rheumatology Association of Uzbekistan, the rights and obligations of members, management structure and decision-making procedures.
